title: The Four Myths

Trying to deny it, they canâ€™t, as they immediately begin to witness its prophecies manifest. Their lives become intertwined with a diverse cast of characters with stories that just keep coming. You, the reader, will be pulled into this epic right along with themâ€”forced to grapple with your own reality even after its conclusion. Magic, mystery, horrorâ€”even humorâ€”intermix, indelibly in this thriller that will hook you and keep you glued to every page till its satisfying climax. A book which leaves readers wanting more, fans of Stephen King, Dan Brown, and Dean Koontz will love The Four Myths, even surprising them by it becoming one of their new favorites.
author: Robert Reisler
